directions: Mix parsley, cucumber, pineapple, pomegranate seeds, onion, and mint in a large bowl. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the salad and toss to coat; season with salt and pepper.
Refrigerate salad until chilled, at least 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Non-Traditional Tabbouleh Salad with Pineapple and Pomegranate Seeds
